Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-50181 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-50181 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-pip is earlier than 24.2-5, affected by CVE-2025-50181
